title: Book a COVID-19 vaccination appointment
author: C=Au; O=The State
description: You can book your COVID-19 vaccine appointment through a GP or pharmacy. Allow around 15 mins for your appointment. Find a clinic and book.
cleaned_text: Book a COVID-19 vaccination appointment You can book your COVID-19 vaccine appointment [through a GP or pharmacy](https://covid-vaccine.healthdirect.gov.au/booking). Allow around 15 mins for your appointment. Vaccination after having COVID-19 Even if you've had COVID-19, you should still get vaccinated. You are far less likely to get severe disease should you get COVID-19 again if you have been vaccinated. You must not attend a vaccination appointment if you have any [COVID-19 symptoms](https://www.qld.gov.au/health/conditions/health-alerts/coronavirus-covid-19/health-advice/about-covid-19/symptoms-of-covid-19). More information Call 134 COVID ( [134 268](tel:134268)) 24 hours, 7 days a week for: - information on the vaccine - assistance with vaccination bookings or appointment enquiries - help understanding this information or to ask for an interpreter—it is free.
